Articles.Content:
Hi guy, I just joined the space race, okay well Ive lost the race bit.

Anyhow Just started with KSP last night and have tossed on a few mods.

Mainly the mechjob one because I suck at the whole flying bit.

So far ive put about 4 RL hours into it and have a nice orbital(120) station under construction. Its not much to look at yet, but in the pic you can see I am docking some more modules. I have to say that seems to be the most time consuming process. I did work up a nice launcher package with a self contained rcs module (for docking manuvers). You can see a pair of them still docked at the station. Next tripI plan to salvage my (big red) fuel tank form the rocket to transfer there liquid fuel before i jettison them from the station.

Well that's my start, hey where on the forums could I keep a journal of my progress?

Hiya Mission Control! There is a "Blog" section you can start a journal on.

Cool station!
